fullName: Login feature: Validate login with email id and password combinations

labels.name: story
labels.value: Validate login with email id and password combinations

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Validate login with email id and password combinations

name: Validate login with email id and password combinations

steps.name: Given  I am on the home page
When  I navigate to login page as a user
When  I log in email address "rahulgmail.com" and password "rahul@12"
Then  I should see the message "Please include an '@' in the email address. 'uesrgmail.com' is missing an '@'"

parameters.name: expectedMessage
parameters.value: Please include an '@' in the email address. 'uesrgmail.com' is missing an '@'
